answers.answer: Morning nausea can be caused by a wide variety of conditions. You didn't tell us your husbands evening and morning fasting glucose numbers or what he is doing to control and manage his diabetes. Diabetes is one cause but so is an gastroenteritis viral infection, over use of or side effects of medications, kidney issues, etc. Since we cannot see or evaluate him over the inet I suggest you work with his health care provider for an accurate diagnosis. Good luck

question: My husband has Type 2 Diabetes.  About 2 times a week he wakes up in the mornings with nausea.  What is the cause of this?
title: Nausea in the morning with type 2 diabetes
